content.json:
# DefenderC2 Command & Control Console

> Enterprise-grade automation and orchestration for Microsoft Defender for Endpoint with zero-configuration deployment.

---

## Configuration

Select your subscription and workspace below. All other settings will be auto-discovered:

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query: Resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces' | summarize by subscriptionId

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query: Resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces' | project id, name, location

parameters.name: TenantId
parameters.label: Target Tenant ID
parameters.query: Resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces' | where id == '{Workspace}' | project tenantId

parameters.name: FunctionAppUrl
parameters.label: Function App URL
parameters.query: Resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.web/sites' | where kind =~ 'functionapp' | where name contains 'defenderc2' or tags['Project'] =~ 'defenderc2' | extend FunctionUrl = strcat('https://', name, '.azurewebsites.net') | project FunctionUrl | limit 1
parameters.description: DefenderC2 Function App URL (auto-discovered). If not found, manually enter: https://your-function-app.azurewebsites.net

content.json:
## Defender C2 - Device Response Actions

Perform Microsoft Defender for Endpoint response actions with **ARM Actions** and **JSONPath parsing**.

### Features:
- ✅ Azure Resource Graph auto-discovery
- ✅ ARM Actions for synchronous operations
- ✅ JSONPath output parsing
- ✅ Multi-tenancy support with automatic TenantId injection
- ✅ Function Key authentication

---
## 🚨 Isolate Device

Isolate devices from the network using ARM Actions with JSONPath transformers.

parameters.name: IsolateDeviceIds
parameters.label: Device IDs (comma-separated)
parameters.description: Enter one or more device IDs separated by commas

content.json:
---
## 🔓 Unisolate Device

Remove network isolation from devices.

---
## 🛡️ Restrict App Execution

Restrict app execution to Microsoft-signed binaries only.

---
## 🔍 Run Antivirus Scan

Execute a full antivirus scan on devices.

---
## 💻 Get Devices

Retrieve device list with JSONPath parsing.

## 📍 Threat Intelligence Manager

Manage threat indicators (IOCs) in Microsoft Defender for Endpoint with **ARM Actions** and **JSONPath parsing**.

### Features:
- ✅ Batch indicator submission (File/IP/URL/Domain)
- ✅ ARM Actions for synchronous operations
- ✅ JSONPath output parsing
- ✅ Multi-tenancy support

---
## 📄 Add File Indicators (Batch)

Submit multiple file hashes at once with ARM Actions.

parameters.name: FileIndicators
parameters.label: File Hashes (comma-separated)
parameters.description: SHA1, SHA256, or MD5 hashes separated by commas

content.json:
---
## 🌐 Add IP Indicators (Batch)

Submit multiple IP addresses at once.

parameters.name: IpIndicators
parameters.label: IP Addresses (comma-separated)
parameters.description: IPv4 or IPv6 addresses separated by commas

content.json:
---
## 🔗 Add URL/Domain Indicators (Batch)

Submit multiple URLs or domains at once.

parameters.name: UrlIndicators
parameters.label: URLs/Domains (comma-separated)
parameters.description: URLs or domain names separated by commas

armActionContext.body: {"action":"Add URL Indicators","tenantId":"{TenantId}","indicators":"{UrlIndicators}","indicatorAction":"{UrlIndicatorAction}","severity":"High","title":"Malicious URLs","description":"Known malicious URLs and domains"}
armActionContext.title: Add URL/Domain Indicators

content.json:
---
## 📊 List All Indicators

View all threat indicators with JSONPath parsing.

## ⚙️ Action Manager

View and manage machine actions with **auto-refresh** and **JSONPath parsing**.

### Features:
- ✅ Auto-refresh with configurable intervals
- ✅ JSONPath output parsing
- ✅ Status filtering
- ✅ Cancel actions via ARM Actions

---
## 📊 Get All Actions

View all machine actions with auto-refresh enabled.

---
## 🔍 Get Action Status

Retrieve status of a specific action.

parameters.name: ActionId
parameters.label: Action ID
parameters.description: Enter specific action ID to query

content.json:
---
## 🛑 Cancel Action

Cancel a specific pending action.

## 🔍 Hunt Manager

Execute advanced hunting queries with **async polling** and **JSONPath parsing**.

### Features:
- ✅ Async hunt execution with auto-refresh
- ✅ JSONPath result parsing
- ✅ Sample query templates
- ✅ Export to Excel capability

---
## 📝 Sample Queries

Select a sample query or enter your own KQL.

parameters.name: SampleQuery
parameters.label: Sample Queries
parameters.jsonData: [{"value":"DeviceEvents | where Timestamp > ago(24h) | where ActionType == 'ProcessCreated' | take 100","label":"Recent Process Creations"},{"value":"AlertInfo | where Timestamp > ago(7d) | where Severity == 'High' | project Timestamp, Title, Severity, Category","label":"High Severity Alerts"},{"value":"DeviceNetworkEvents | where Timestamp > ago(1d) | where RemoteIPType == 'Public' | summarize Count=count() by RemoteIP, DeviceName","label":"Public Network Connections"},{"value":"DeviceFileEvents | where Timestamp > ago(1d) | where FileName endswith '.exe' | project Timestamp, DeviceName, FileName, FolderPath","label":"Recent EXE Files"},{"value":"DeviceLogonEvents | where Timestamp > ago(1d) | where ActionType == 'LogonFailed' | summarize FailedAttempts=count() by DeviceName, AccountName","label":"Failed Logon Attempts"}]

parameters.name: HuntQuery
parameters.label: KQL Query (or use sample above)
parameters.description: Enter your KQL query or select from samples

content.json:
---
## 🎯 Execute Hunt

Run your hunt query with automatic result polling.

---
## 📊 Hunt Status

Monitor the status of your hunt query execution.

## 🚨 Incident Manager

Manage security incidents with **filters** and **JSONPath parsing**.

### Features:
- ✅ Severity and status filtering
- ✅ JSONPath output parsing
- ✅ Update incidents via ARM Actions
- ✅ Add comments to incidents

---
## 📊 Get Incidents

View incidents with filtering options.

---
## ✏️ Update Incident

Update incident status or assignment.

---
## 💬 Add Comment to Incident

Add a comment to an existing incident.

## 🛡️ Custom Detection Manager

Manage custom detection rules with **ARM Actions** and **JSONPath parsing**.

### Features:
- ✅ List all detections with JSONPath
- ✅ Create/Update/Delete via ARM Actions
- ✅ Backup detections for migration
- ✅ Sample detection templates

---
## 📋 List All Detections

View all custom detection rules with JSONPath parsing.

---
## ➕ Create Detection Rule

Create a new custom detection rule.

---
## ✏️ Update Detection Rule

Modify an existing detection rule.

---
## ❌ Delete Detection Rule

Remove a custom detection rule.

---
## 💾 Backup Detections

Export all detection rules for backup or migration.

## 🖥️ Interactive Console - MDE Command Execution

### Async Command Execution with Auto-Polling

This interactive console allows you to execute native MDE commands asynchronously with automatic result polling. Features:

- ✅ **Async Execution** - Commands run in the background via Function App
- ✅ **Auto-Polling** - Automatic status checking with configurable intervals
- ✅ **JSON Parsing** - Response data automatically parsed and displayed
- ✅ **Multi-Action Support** - Execute device actions, queries, and API calls
- ✅ **Result History** - Track command execution history and results

---

parameters.name: RefreshInterval
parameters.label: Auto Refresh Interval
parameters.jsonData: [{"value":"10000","label":"🟢 10 seconds"},{"value":"30000","label":"🟢 30 seconds"},{"value":"60000","label":"🟡 1 minute"},{"value":"300000","label":"🔵 5 minutes"},{"value":"0","label":"🔴 Manual Only"}]

parameters.name: CommandType
parameters.label: Command Type
parameters.jsonData: [{"value":"dispatcher","label":"🎯 Device Actions (Isolate, Scan, etc.)"},{"value":"hunt","label":"🔍 Advanced Hunting Query"},{"value":"ti","label":"📍 Threat Intelligence"},{"value":"incident","label":"🚨 Incident Management"},{"value":"detection","label":"🛡️ Custom Detection"}]

parameters.name: ActionName
parameters.label: Action/Command
parameters.jsonData: [{"value":"isolate","label":"Isolate Device"},{"value":"unisolate","label":"Unisolate Device"},{"value":"scan","label":"Run Antivirus Scan"},{"value":"collect","label":"Collect Investigation Package"},{"value":"restrict","label":"Restrict App Execution"},{"value":"unrestrict","label":"Unrestrict App Execution"},{"value":"stopandquarantine","label":"Stop & Quarantine File"},{"value":"runscript","label":"Run Live Response Script"},{"value":"getfile","label":"Get File (Live Response)"},{"value":"putfile","label":"Put File (Live Response)"}]

parameters.name: DeviceIds
parameters.label: Target Device IDs (comma-separated)
parameters.description: Enter one or more device IDs separated by commas

parameters.name: CommandParams
parameters.label: Additional Parameters (JSON)
parameters.description: Optional JSON parameters for the command

content.json:
---
### 🚀 Step 1: Execute Command

Click the button below to execute the selected command. The Function App will process the request asynchronously.

---
### ⏳ Step 2: Poll for Results

Automatically polls for command completion. Refresh interval: **{RefreshInterval}ms**

content.title: 📊 Action Status (Auto-refresh)
content.noDataMessage: No active actions to poll. Execute a command first.

content.json:
---
### 📥 Step 3: View Results

Parsed JSON results from the command execution.

content.title: 📋 Command Results
content.noDataMessage: No results available yet. Command may still be executing.

content.json:
---
### 📚 Command History

Recent command executions and their status.

---
### 🔄 How It Works

**Architecture:**
1. **Execute** → Sends command to Function App with parameters
2. **Function App** → Authenticates with MDE API using managed identity
3. **Poll** → Automatically checks action status at configured interval
4. **Parse** → Extracts and displays JSON results in table format
5. **History** → Tracks all executions for audit and review

**Key Features:**
- ✅ Async execution - commands run in background
- ✅ Auto-polling - no manual status checking needed
- ✅ JSON parsing - structured data display
- ✅ Multi-tenant - works across different tenants
- ✅ Audit trail - complete execution history

**Supported Commands:**
- Device actions (isolate, scan, collect packages)
- Live Response operations (run scripts, get/put files)
- Advanced Hunting queries
- Threat Intelligence management
- Incident and detection operations

---

> 💡 **Tip:** Set auto-refresh to 30 seconds for active monitoring, or disable for manual control.
